text: packed with the intensive caramelized
fish sauce flavor fried baby squid in
fish sauce is one of my favorite side
dishes to serve with rice it's so simple
to prepare but you will never have it
enough
let's begin
ingredients you will need 500 gram of
baby squids fish sauce cornstarch sugar
salt some chili flakes chili sauce
scallion some fresh chilies a lime
garlic ginger and some butter to prepare
the baby squid remove the eyes the teeth
and the quill make parallel incisions
along the body of the squid so the
seasonings can absorb better quickly
blanch the squid in water with a piece
of smacked ginger and shallot then
transfer to a mesh strainer to drain
season the squid with some salt and
chicken stock powder toss well and cover
leave to marinate in the fridge for
about 15 minutes then top the baby squid
with some cornstarch next heat some oil
in a pan and fry the squid until quite
golden brown
to make the sauce in a small bowl
combine one and a half tablespoon of
sugar a tablespoon of fish sauce a
tablespoon of lime juice a teaspoon of
chili sauce and half a teaspoon of chili
powder also add three tablespoons of
water and stir well melt a tablespoon of
butter in a pan and fry two tablespoons
of mint garlic until golden brown
transfer the garlic chips into a small
bowl pour in the sauce and bring to a
boil make sure you turn on the kitchen
hood at this stage so the whole house
will not smell of fish sauce when the
sauce is slightly thickened add in the
fried squid and toss well simmer on low
for one to two more minutes add the
chopped scallion transfer to a blade to
serve with some fresh cucumber and mint
garnish with some fresh chili slices and
the garlic chips wow it smells so
incredibly awesome the baby squids are
coated with that amazing caramelized
fish sauce glaze
it's so tasty that your whole family can
add for more if you like the recipe
don't forget to click like and subscribe
to my channel for more recipes like this
i will see you there next time bye
[Music]
you
